# Project: Test & Typecheck MCP Server
# Purpose: Enable LLMs to understand how to safely interact with this MCP server.

Contact: maintainer@example.com
Repository: https://github.com/cloudbring/test-and-typecheck-mcp-server
Documentation: https://github.com/cloudbring/test-and-typecheck-mcp-server#readme

Crawl-Delay: 2

# Guidance
